mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY N.BOARD_NUM DESC) RNUM, N.BOARD_NUM, N.BOARD_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, N.BOARD_DATE, TO_CHAR(N.BOARD_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS BOARD_TIME, N.BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD N, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE N.BOARD_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND BOARD_DEL_GB = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NUM DESC) RNUM, N.NOTICE_NUM, N.NOTICE_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, N.NOTICE_DATE, TO_CHAR(N.NOTICE_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS NOTICE_TIME, N.NOTICE_COUNT FROM NOTICE N, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE N.NOTICE_WRITER = MEM_NUM(+) AND NOTICE_DEL_GB = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.QNA_NUM DESC) RNUM, A.*, DECODE(B.QNA_NUM, A.QNA_NUM, 'Y', 'N') AS QNA_YORN FROM ( SELECT Q.QNA_NUM, Q.QNA_TITLE, M.MEM_ID, Q.QNA_DATE, TO_CHAR(Q.QNA_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS QNA_TIME, Q.QNA_TYPE, Q.QNA_PARENT, Q.QNA_COUNT FROM QNA Q, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M WHERE Q.QNA_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND Q.QNA_PARENT IS NULL AND Q.QNA_DEL_GB = 'N' AND M.MEM_ID = #{id}
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.QNA_NUM FROM QNA A, QNA B WHERE A.QNA_NUM = B.QNA_PARENT ) B ON A.QNA_NUM = B.QNA_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_WRITER, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_TYPE, QNA_PARENT ) VALUES ( QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{QNA_TITLE}, (SELECT MEM_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = 'admin'), #{QNA_RE}, #{QNA_TYPE}, #{QNA_NUM} )
